sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>death</radical> and the kanji <kanji>death</kanji> are the same.
meaningInfo: This thing is deceased. It ain't alive anymore.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>death</kanji> will be because of a <reading>bow</reading>ling (<ja>ぼう</ja>) accident. Oh, you didn't know? You're going to be hit by a giant bowling ball and crushed flat.
readingInfo: You didn't want to know what would cause your death, you say? Well that's a shame. I guess you could try to avoid bowling from now on, but that won't do any good. Mark my words, your death will be bowling-related.
